### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action On Bonemeal

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_bonemeal)

Execute actions upon applying a Bonemeal to a block.

Type ID: `apugli:action_on_bonemeal`




---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "apugli:action_on_bonemeal",
    "block_action": {
        "type": "apoli:set_block",
        "block": "minecraft:diamond_ore"
    },
    "block_condition": {
        "type": "apoli:block",
        "block": "minecraft:potato"
    }
}
```

This example will replace a Potato block with a Diamond Ore block if the player that has the power were to apply Bonemeal to the said crop block.

### Examples

```json

    "type": "apugli:action_on_bonemeal",
    "block_action": {
        "type": "apoli:set_block",
```

This example will replace a Potato block with a Diamond Ore block if the player that has the power were to apply Bonemeal to the said crop block.

block_action.description: If specified, execute this action at the block the Bonemeal is applied on.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, execute this action at the block the Bonemeal is applied on.

self_action.description: If specified, execute this action on the entity that applied the Bonemeal on a block.
self_action.markdownDescription: If specified, execute this action on the entity that applied the Bonemeal on a block.

block_condition.description: If specified, only execute the specified action(s) if the block the Bonemeal is applied on fulfills this condition.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only execute the specified action(s) if the block the Bonemeal is applied on fulfills this condition.
